title: Defeat Ketheric Thorm
content:
ps

You need to solve the mind Puzzle in Mind Flayer Colony, then insert the Waking Mind jar into Mind-Archive Interface to learn the permanent buff Githzerai Mind Barrier. Notes & tips go here

All Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik ♦ Aid the Underduke ♦ Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help ♦ Avenge Glut's Circle ♦ Avenge the Drowned ♦ Avenge the Hag Survivors ♦ Avenge the Ironhands ♦ Blind the Absolute ♦ Break Yurgi's Contract ♦ Break Yurgir's Contract ♦ Call of the Blood
